results.name: Triangle read by rows, square of an infinite lower triangular matrix with 1's in the first column and the rest 2's.
comment: Row sums = A056220 starting with offset 1: (1, 7, 17, 31, 49, 71, 97,...).
formula: Triangle read by rows, square of an infinite lower triangular matrix with 1's in the first column and the rest 2's. Square of (A000012 * (S(k) * 0^(n-k)), 1<=k<=n
example: The square of the infinite lower triangular matrix (1; 1,2; 1,2,2;...) =
